UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effect of Acylation on the Antimicrobial Activity of Temporin B Analogues.
Literature.Author: Avitabile C, D'Andrea LD, D'Aversa E, Milani R, Gambari R, Romanelli A

Literature.Title: New Perspectives in the Antimicrobial Activity of the Amphibian Temporin B: Peptide Analogs Are Effective Inhibitors of Candida albicans Growth
Literature.Author: Kakar A, Holzknecht J, Dubrac S, Gelmi ML, Romanelli A, Marx F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(DE3)(MIC=0.2±0.03µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=0.025±0.03µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.5±0.25µM),Candida albicans CBS 5982(IC90=1.8µM),Candida albicans CBS 5982(IC90=7.2µM),Candida albicans CBS 5982(IC90=3.6µM),Candida albicans(IC90=1.8µM),Candida glabrata CBS 138(IC90=1.8µM),Candida parapsilosis CBS 604(IC90=1.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(IC90=3.6µM)
